name: Bit Gambit
description:
A short wave-based shooter created by Jake Ellis for the FFS 2022 GameJam. Music provided by Alexey Kasyanchuk.

If you enjoyed the game, please drop a comment! This is a prototype for a possible full game, so let me know if you'd like to see this game expanded upon in the future and what you'd like to see added. All feedback is welcome!

CONTROLS

WASD = Move

Space = Jump, press again in midair to double jump

LMB = Fire

ESC = Pause

TIPS & TRICKS

If you're having some trouble reaching the end, here's some quick tips for you!

- Jumping grants you a small amount of invincibility, so use your jump to avoid being surrounded!

- Your health is fully restored on levels 4, 8 and 12, so if you're down to your last pip, don't worry! Just aim to level up ASAP!

- Keep an eye on the "ENEMY BEHIND" alert at the bottom of the screen. It can save you from taking damage from sneakier enemies!

- Every time you reload you have a small chance to get a powerful Super weapon, so don't be shy about burning through ammo!
